Sentencas: In the past few years, triple (H+/O2-/e(-)) conducting materials have been regarded as one of the most promising electrode categories for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs

Sentencas: In this work, a layer-structured LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-delta (LNCA) with triple conduction has been studied.
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs

Sentencas: The semiconductor-ionic conductor (SIC) LNCA-SDC composite has been fabricated by compositing the LNCA material with ionic conductor, i.e., samarium doped ceria (SDC).
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of the LNCA-SDC composite was studied by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, while its electronic conductivity was confirmed by d.c. polarization method.
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs

Sentencas: It is found that the ionic conductivity of the composite is higher than the electronic conductivity by several orders of magnitude.
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs

Sentencas: The charge carriers and transportation properties of LNCA-SDC were studied using H+ and O2- blocking layer cells respectively.
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs

Sentencas: Results prove that the LNCA-SDC composite is a hybrid oxygen ion-proton conducting material.
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs

Sentencas: The oxygen ion conduction is dominated at low temperature (425 -500 degrees C), however, it is comparable with H+ conduction at high temperature (550 degrees C).
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs

Sentencas: Additionally, the formation of Li2CO3 under fuel cell operation environment was observed and the mechanism of the hybrid conductivity of LNCA-SDC was studied.
Titulo: Study on charge transportation in the layer-structured oxide composite of SOFCs
